## Question 1: Means

```{r, eval = TRUE}
knitr::current_input()
```


Find the mean of the vector `a`

```{r, version = "A"}
set.seed(123)
```

```{r, version = "B"}
set.seed(456)
```

```{r, version = c("A", "B")}
42
```

```{r}
a <- rnorm(10)
```

```{r, eval = TRUE, version = "none"}
# placeholder
a <- 1
```

`r mean(a)`
